name: TagBalls
description:
Description

The ball rolls to where you click.

You control the ball and collect all the dots.

The stage is cleared when all dots are collected.

player

dot

power dot (power up when you got)

enemy 

weak enemy (Hitting a powered up player will incapacitate them for a few seconds.)

Credits

以下のツール・素材を使用させていただいています。

魔王魂
